page.title: 20KILKHAMPTON W.I.
page.content: The data for Kilkhampton South has been collected and prepared by the Kilkhampton Womens' Institute. Mrs. C. Burdekin,Mrs. P.Taylor, and Mrs.P. Shearwood have done the text with the help of Mrs.H.Webley to do the land cover. This W.I. is affiliated to the County and National Federations and has been formed since 1927.There are 30 members ranging in age from about 30 years to our oldest member Mrs.I. Hobbs,84 years.It has been involved in village projects such as anti-litter campaigns, new curtains for the village hall and this year hopes to arrange some tree-planting. The monthly meetings have a speaker or demonstrator and are both social and educational.
